body: I dunno if it is the kami-sama/youkai flow or the babaya style chugoku-kansaish talk of the goddesses but I nutted to the star

1. This author's works are kinda raunchy in innocent(?) way? I just like it.
2. Picolini should be used as sacrifice for this cousin's english translation. All in favor say I.
It woud be so Epic to have this Translated and Preserved in a Time Capsule
